# llms.txt - Content & Prompt Bank for TamilHarmonic Website
# Generated: 2025-11-28

#########################
# Site Identity
#########################
site_name: Tamil Harmonic
primary_domain: https://www.tamilharmonic.com
owner: Trader Raj
primary_language: ta (Tamil)
secondary_language: en (English)
business_type: Trading education (Indian Market, Nifty, Forex)
location: Tamil Nadu, India
audience: Beginner to advanced retail traders, Tamil-speaking learners, forex enthusiasts

#########################
# High-Level Guidance for LLM
#########################
# Tone: Friendly, authoritative, conversational, encouraging, practical
# Style: Tamil-first for local pages; clear English for wider reach. Use short sentences, examples, and step-by-step instructions for technical topics.
# Safety & Compliance Notes (to include in generated content):
# - Content should clearly state it is for educational purposes only and not financial advice.
# - If business is not SEBI-registered, include a prominent disclaimer about not being a registered investment advisor.
# - Avoid promising guaranteed returns or suggesting insider/illegal trading practices.

#########################
# Prompt Templates (general)
#########################
# 1) Page meta + short description
# "Write a 150-character meta description for the page [PAGE_NAME] on Tamil Harmonic. Language: [ta|en]. Tone: [friendly|formal|urgent|conversational]. Include main keyword: [KEYWORD]. Add CTA at the end."

# 2) Long-form blog post outline
# "Create a detailed outline for a 1200-1600 word blog post on '[TOPIC]'. Target audience: beginner Tamil traders. Include: intro, 5 sections (with subpoints), examples, a short glossary, 3 image suggestions, and a 2-line CTA in Tamil."

# 3) YouTube video description
# "Write a YouTube description for a 12-minute video titled '[VIDEO_TITLE]'. Include: short hook (first 1-2 lines), 4 bullet timestamps, keyword-rich summary in Tamil, links to course and telegram, and 3 hashtags. Keep total length under 500 words."

# 4) Ad headline + description (policy-safe)
# "Provide 3 variations of ad headlines (max 30 chars) and 3 ad descriptions (max 90 chars) for promoting a free demo trading class in Tamil. Must include the phrase 'Educational only' and avoid claims of guaranteed profit."

# 5) FAQ generation
# "Generate 8 FAQs for the page '[PAGE_NAME]'. Answers must be 1-2 sentences, in Tamil, simple language, and include a short safety/disclaimer line at the end."

#########################
# SEO metadata templates
#########################
# TITLE: {PageTopic} | Tamil Harmonic - Learn Nifty & Forex in Tamil
# META DESCRIPTION (EN): {one-line summary up to 160 characters} | Free demo classes • Educational only
# META DESCRIPTION (TA): {Tamil summary under 160 chars} • இலவச டெமோ வகுப்புகள்
# OG/Twitter: image -> /og-image.jpg, title same as page title, description same as meta

#########################
# Long headings & hero lines the owner requested
#########################
# Tamil long interactive hero heading (example):
hero_heading_ta_long: "நீங்கள் பணம் இழக்கிறீர்களா? உண்மை காரணங்களை புரிந்து கொள்வோம் — நிதி மனநிலையை கட்டுப்படுத்துவது எப்படி, நம்முடன் படித்து பழக்கங்கள் மாற்றுங்கள். இலவச டெமோ வகுப்பு இங்கு!"

# Short Tamil CTA line
cta_ta: "இப்போது சேருங்கள் — இலவச டெமோ" 

# English interactive hero heading (example):
hero_heading_en_long: "Losing money in trading? Learn how to control emotions, build a plan, and trade with discipline — Educational classes, demo sessions available."

# Ad-suitable English short heading examples:
ad_headlines_en:
- "Free Demo: Learn Nifty in Tamil"
- "Control Emotions, Trade Smarter"
- "Tamil Trading Classes — Educational Only"

#########################
# Example Ad Copy Variations (policy-safe)
#########################
# Ad 1
headline: "Free Demo: Learn Nifty in Tamil"
description: "Educational classes for beginners. No guaranteed profits. Join demo class today."

# Ad 2
headline: "Control Emotions, Trade Smarter"
description: "Practical lessons on trading psychology and risk management. Educational only."

#########################
# Course / Landing Page Sections (content blocks)
#########################
1. Hero (title, subtitle, CTA)
2. What you will learn (3–6 bullets)
3. Who this is for (beginners, part-timers, hobby traders)
4. Course curriculum (modules + short bullets)
5. Demo class schedule (dates, signup link)
6. Testimonials (video/text) — include note: "educational experience; results vary"
7. Pricing & FAQ
8. Contact & social links

#########################
# Sample Course Curriculum (short)
#########################
Module 1: Market Basics — NSE, BSE, order types, lots
Module 2: Technical Tools — Candlesticks, support/resistance, indicators
Module 3: Nifty Intraday Strategies — Plan, entry/exit, position sizing
Module 4: Forex Basics — currency pairs, pips, leverage, risk
Module 5: Trading Psychology & Risk Management
Module 6: Harmonic Patterns & Price Action
Module 7: Paper Trading & Demo Sessions

#########################
# YouTube Description Template (example)
#########################
video_description_template:
"
Hook: இந்த வீடியோவில் நாங்கள் இன்று Nifty 50 இல் முக்கிய support & resistance சுட்டிகளைக் கற்கப் போகிறோம்.
Timestamps:
0:00 — Intro
1:15 — Market Hours & Basics
3:40 — Key Levels
7:20 — Live Example
10:45 — Tips & Summary

Join our free demo class: https://www.tamilharmonic.com/get-started
Telegram: https://t.me/tamilharmonictraderraj
Disclaimer: Content is educational only and not financial advice.
#Nifty #TamilTrading #TamilHarmonic
"

#########################
# FAQ Examples
#########################
FAQ_1_q: "நான் புதுமுகர் — நான் இந்தக் کور்ஸை எடுத்துக் கொள்ளலாமா?"
FAQ_1_a: "ஆம் — இக்கோர்ஸ் அடிப்படை முதல் தொடங்குகிறது. இது கல்வி மட்டுமே; நிதி ஆலோசனையாகாது."

FAQ_2_q: "நீங்கள் SEBI-பதிவு செய்யப்பட்ட ஆலோசகர்களா?"
FAQ_2_a: "இல்லை — நாங்கள் கல்வி சேவையை வழங்குகிறோம். முதலீட்டு ஆலோசனையில்லை."

#########################
# Mandatory Disclaimer Texts (short)
#########################
disclaimer_short_ta: "இந்த உள்ளடக்கம் கல்விக்காக மட்டுமே. நாங்கள் SEBI அல்லது எந்த விதமான பதிவு செய்யப்பட்ட முதலீட்டு ஆலோசகரும் அல்ல." 
disclaimer_short_en: "For educational purposes only. We are not a SEBI-registered investment advisor. No guaranteed returns."

#########################
# Content Generation Examples (quick prompts to paste into LLM)
#########################
1) "Write a 200-word landing page intro in Tamil for Tamil Harmonic that explains who we are, what students will learn, and includes the short disclaimer. Tone: encouraging, simple."

2) "Create 5 YouTube video titles in Tamil for Nifty intraday topic. Keep each title under 60 characters and include the keyword 'Nifty'."

3) "Generate 10 tweet-sized tips (max 240 chars) in Tamil about trading psychology and risk management. Each tip should end with a short CTA: 'Join demo'."

#########################
# Output Formats to include in file
#########################
- Plain text snippets (Tamil + English)
- JSON-LD examples (already in website head)
- Short disclaimers and compliance notices
- Prompt templates for reuse

#########################
# Notes for marketing & policy compliance
#########################
- Always include the educational disclaimer on pages and ads if not SEBI-registered.
- Avoid using terms like "guaranteed profit", "sure win", or "get rich" in ad copy.
- For paid ad platforms (Google, Meta), ensure ad text follows platform financial ads policy and country-specific rules.

# File end
